reviewText: This is a bunch o' Loretta clips over a long-ish period of time... it's terrific!  Especially the ones where she's playing guitar, she's just more animated in those.  AND... if that wasn't enough... LOTS of close up shots of Don Helms on Steel Guitar!!  THE Hank Sr. steel player, originator of that classic Hank sound.  Of course here he's playing Pedal Steel, so it's not quite as good, but still, Don Helms!
